block.para: Shows how to use the &Python3long; to create a web application that tracks work items in &DDBlong; and emails reports by using &SESlong; (&SES;). This example uses the Flask web framework to host a local website and render templated web pages.

listitem.para: Integrate a Flask web application with &AWS; services.
List, add, update, and delete items in a &DDB; table.
Send an email report of filtered work items using &SES;.
Make &AWS; requests with an &IAMlong; (&IAM;) role that restricts permissions.
Deploy and manage example resources with the included &CFNlong; script.

block.para: For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
